frontend_features.json: Features/workarounds for driver bugs and other behaviors seen
on all platforms.

features.name: lose_context_on_out_of_memory
description: Some users rely on a lost context notification if a GL_OUT_OF_MEMORY error occurs

features.name: disable_program_caching_for_transform_feedback
description: On some GPUs, program binaries don't contain transform feedback varyings

features.name: scalarize_vec_and_mat_constructor_args
description: Always rewrite vec/mat constructors to be consistent

features.name: disable_program_binary
description: Disable support for GL_OES_get_program_binary

features.name: disable_draw_buffers_indexed
description: Disable support for OES_draw_buffers_indexed and EXT_draw_buffers_indexed

features.name: disable_anisotropic_filtering
description: Disable support for anisotropic filtering

features.name: allow_compressed_formats
description: Allow compressed formats

features.name: single_threaded_texture_decompression
description: Disables multi-threaded decompression of compressed texture formats

features.name: force_depth_attachment_init_on_clear
description: Force depth attachment initialization on clear ops

features.name: enable_capture_limits
description: Set the context limits like frame capturing was enabled

features.name: enable_compressing_pipeline_cache_in_thread_pool
description: Enable compressing pipeline cache in thread pool.

features.name: force_robust_resource_init
description: Force-enable robust resource init

features.name: force_init_shader_variables
description: Force-enable shader variable initialization

features.name: enable_program_binary_for_capture
description: Even if FrameCapture is enabled, enable GL_OES_get_program_binary

features.name: force_gl_error_checking
description: Force GL error checking (i.e. prevent applications from disabling error checking

features.name: emulate_pixel_local_storage
description: Emulate ANGLE_shader_pixel_local_storage using shader images

features.name: cache_compiled_shader
description: Enable to cache compiled shaders
